name: admin-panel
description: This is a boilerplate project that implements the functionality of the admin panel. The project is built using microservices architecture. To run it, you will need to install [Docker](https://github.com/docker).

scripts.install:all: npm --prefix apps/backend/api ci && npm --prefix apps/backend/mailer ci && npm --prefix apps/frontend/panel-react ci && npm --prefix apps/frontend/panel-vue ci && npm --prefix scripts ci && npm --prefix shared ci
scripts.lint:all: npm --prefix apps/backend/api run lint && npm --prefix apps/backend/mailer run lint && npm --prefix apps/frontend/panel-react run lint:fix && npm --prefix apps/frontend/panel-vue run lint:fix
